japanese: 彼は私たち全員の中で一番速く起きた。
english: He got up the earliest of us all.

japanese: この本はあの本より少し難しい。
english: This book is a little more difficult than that one.

japanese: 彼はクラスの他のどの少年よりも速く走ります。
english: He runs faster than any other boy in his class.

japanese: あの少年はケンほど泳ぐのがうまくない。
english: That boy doesn't swim as well as Ken.

japanese: この映画はあの映画よりずっと面白い。
english: This movie is much more interesting than that one.

japanese: 彼は私より少し早く起きました。
english: He got up a little earlier than I.

japanese: 彼女はクラスの他のどの生徒よりも一生懸命勉強します。
english: She studies harder than any other student in her class.

japanese: この辞書はあの辞書よりずっと役に立ちます。
english: This dictionary is much more useful than that one.

japanese: 私の母は父より少し若いです。
english: My mother is a little younger than my father.

japanese: 彼は世界で最も裕福な男の一人です。
english: He is one of the richest men in the world.
